programme.longDescription: Visit Britain's most murderous county in a new episode as DCI Barnaby and his trusty sidekick, DS Winter solve perplexing crimes in the delightful yet deadly Midsomer.
programme.title: Midsomer Murders

heroCtaLabel.label: Watch Now
heroCtaLabel.ariaLabel: Watch episode 1 of series 1, The Killings at Badger's Drift
heroCtaLabel.episodeLabel: S1: E1 - The Killings at Badger's Drift

titles.description: An elderly resident of Badger's Drift is found dead in her cottage - is it an accident?
titles.longDescription: The sleepy calm of Badger's Drift village is shattered when one of its elderly residents is found dead in her cottage. DCI Tom Barnaby is sure it was not an accident.

heroCtaLabel.label: Watch Now
heroCtaLabel.ariaLabel: Watch episode 2 of series 1, Written in Blood

titles.description: A writers' circle witnesses a sequence of gruesome events far stranger than any fiction.
titles.guidance: Contains some scenes of violence and sexual material.
titles.longDescription: A writers' circle is anticipating a visit from a best-selling novelist, but they are about to witness a sequence of gruesome events far stranger than any fiction.

heroCtaLabel.label: Watch Now
heroCtaLabel.ariaLabel: Watch episode 3 of series 1, Death of a Hollow Man
heroCtaLabel.episodeLabel: S1: E3 - Death of a Hollow Man

titles.description: An elderly resident in the quiet rural village of Ferne Basset is found drowned.
titles.guidance: Contains some violent moments and moderate language.
titles.longDescription: An elderly resident in a rural village is found drowned after a violent attack as a local amateur dramatic production reveals a new meaning to corpsing.

heroCtaLabel.label: Watch Now
heroCtaLabel.ariaLabel: Watch episode 4 of series 1, Faithful Unto Death

titles.description: The wife of the local craft centre's owner goes missing. Starring Mark Bazeley.

titles.longDescription: Barnaby is called to the village of Morton Fendle after the wife of the local craft centre's owner goes missing and a neighbour is murdered.

heroCtaLabel.ariaLabel: Watch episode 5 of series 1, Death in Disguise

titles.guidance: Contains some violence and crime scene images.
titles.longDescription: When the founder of a nearby commune is murdered, DCI Barnaby is faced with an eccentric cast of suspects including a psychic and a boy who has lost his tongue.

titles.longDescription: Richard Briers guest stars. The inhabitants of a sleepy village are shocked when a local property developer, recently diagnosed with a malignant brain tumour, is brutally murdered.

titles.longDescription: When a woman is killed in local woodland, nine years after three identical murders, Barnaby and Troy are led into the murky, clandestine world of Midsomer Worthy.

titles.longDescription: When the wife of a wealthy landowner is bludgeoned to death with a cricket bat, DCI Barnaby becomes enmeshed in a succession of calculating murders.

titles.longDescription: The body of Rowing Club chairman Guy Sweetman is found bludgeoned and drowned during a regatta. As Sweetman was prolifically promiscuous, jealousy would seem to be the motive.
